data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Mountain Province, Philippines, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mountain Province, Philippines

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Mountain Province, Philippines. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary: On average, 82 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Mountain Province, Philippines.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Mountain Province, Philippines and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Mountain Province who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Mountain Province, Philippines.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 225,231 believers in the state of Mountain Province into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 1,245,587 people in the state of Mountain Province who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

location.name: Mountain Province
location.people_groups_list: Kalanguya, Tinoc, Karao, Inibaloi, Kalanguya, Kayapa, Kankanaey
